max.gteMin: Max must be greater than or equal to min.

common.duplicateIds: This list cannot contain duplicate items.

primaryColor.invalid: Invalid color format. Must be a hex code (e.g., #RRGGBB).

secondaryColor.invalid: Invalid color format. Must be a hex code (e.g., #RRGGBB).

dateOfBirth.future: Date of birth cannot be in the future.

weight.positive: Weight must be a positive number.

height.positive: Height must be a positive number.

substitutions.self: An exercise cannot list itself as a substitute.

equipment.otherOnly: If 'other' is the only equipment, please provide a more specific one.

cycleOrder.required: A plan assigned to a cycle must have a non-negative order.

endDate.beforeStart: End date cannot be earlier than start date.

endTime.beforeStart: End time cannot be earlier than start time.

duration.mismatch: Duration does not match start and end times.

priority.min: Substitution priority must be at least 1.

weight.positive: Weight must be a positive number.

reps.positive: Reps must be a positive number.

date.future: Date cannot be in the future.

primaryColor.invalid: Invalid color format. Must be a hex code (e.g., #RRGGBB).

secondaryColor.invalid: Invalid color format. Must be a hex code (e.g., #RRGGBB).

ascending.invalid: In ascending mode, start counts must be less than end counts.

descending.invalid: In descending mode, start counts must be greater than end counts.

singleExerciseGroup.maxLength: A single exercise group can contain at most one exercise.

supersetExerciseGroup.exactLength: A superset must contain exactly two exercises.

skipped.nonZero: Skipped exercises cannot have non-zero volume, counts, or sets.

performedSet.weightAndPercentage: Cannot specify both weight and percentage.

counter.invalid: Counter value must be a non-negative integer.

age.invalid: Age must be a non-negative integer.

substitution.priority: Substitution priority must be between 1 and 5.

superset.invalidExerciseCount: A superset must contain exactly two exercises.

circuit.invalidExerciseCount: A circuit must contain at least two exercises.

amrapEmom.durationRequired: {{type}} groups require a duration to be set.

trainingPlan.noSessions: A training plan must have at least one session.
